title: Dynamic vs. Static Visualization: Comparative Science Learning Effectiveness Project for [Large-Scale] Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science concepts (states of matter, life phenomena, etc.) and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Students participate in real-time classes using digital devices (tablet/laptop) and are evaluated based on project outcomes. Comparative analysis of visualization materials focused on "matter changes" and "ecosystems" in science curricula.

learning_goals: They can compare and explain the characteristics of dynamic and static visualizations.
They can identify three or more situations where dynamic visualization is more effective than static visualization in science concept learning.
They can complete and present a science project using animation-based learning materials.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
